title: Prima Veritas Ledger Schema
description: Canonical schema for deterministic event ledgers produced by the Prima Veritas Kernel. This schema defines structure only; it encodes no meaning or interpretation.

ledger_version.description: Kernel ledger format version. Changes are breaking.

source_id.description: Stable identifier for the ingested source material.

created_at.description: Creation timestamp carried from ingest metadata (not generated here).

event_count.description: Total number of events recorded in this ledger.

event_id.description: Stable deterministic identifier for this event.

event_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of this event payload.

payload.description: Raw atomic event payload. No interpretation applied.

prev_hash.description: Hash of the previous event in the chain, or null for index 0.

ledger_hash.description: Final SHA-256 hash representing the entire ledger state.
